name: Firework Shoppable Live Video
author: Loop Now Technologies, Inc.

sections.installation:
PERFORM A NEW INSTALLATION
After downloading the ZIP file of the plugin,

  1. Log in to the administrator panel
  2. Go to Plugins Add > New > Upload
  3. Click Choose file (Browse) and select the downloaded zip file of the plugin
  4. Click Install Now button
  5. Click Activate button for activating Short Video Gallery. You will need to register an account with Firework, or to log in to Firework to access the videos

STEPS TO EMBED FIREWORK SHOPPABLE LIVE VIDEOS

  1. In your WordPress post / page where you would like to place your videos, select the + icon and then select the Firework Shoppable Live Video plug-in
  2. Choose your embed layout and which playlist / channel / video you would like to embed
sections.changelog:
6.3

  • Update: Dynamically Added channel id for 1:1 widget

6.2

  • Update: Commented out the One to One Script / Uncomment and enter the chat channel id when you want to enable 1:1 widget

6.1

  • Update: Chat Channel for 1:1 Integration

6.0

  • Added: Supports Purchase Tracking
  • Added: Supports 1:1 Integration

5.9

  • Update: Updated Provider Values

5.8

  • Update: Updated Marketing Content

5.7

  • Update: Marketing Content and assets updated

5.6

  • Update: Added Compatibility with WordPress 6.0.1

5.5

  • Update: Added Firework Instant checkout functionality

5.4

  • Bug Fix: Firework GET videos API Updated.

5.3

  • Bug Fix: Firework Access Token issue resolved.

5.2

  • Update: Removed Woocoomerce Plugin dependencies. Now you can install Firework Plugin without Woocoomerce Plugin.

5.1

  • New: Native Cart Integration for Liveshopping
  • Update: Removed CoCart Dependencies

5.0

  • New: Woocoomerce plugin is required for this update
  • Update: Renamed menu title from Short Video Gallery to Firework
  • New: Added Firework business portal dashboard in admin panel
  • New: OAuth 2.0 login flow to connect to business portal from WordPress
  • New: Auto generate REST API keys for Firework / Woocoomerce connetivity
  • New: Auto generate Webhooks (Update, Restore, Delete) for realtime products sync with firework account
  • New: Fast-checkout compatibility

4.0.3

  • Update: added compatibility for WordPress 5.8.1

4.0.2

  • Update: short-code compatibility

4.0.1

  • Update: readme, logo and screenshots
  • Update: plugin UI

4.0.0

  • New: connection with Firework business
  • New: compatibility with WordPress Gutenberg editor
  • New: new layout “Story block”

3.0.7

  • Fix : tracking fixes

3.0.6

  • Fix : admin content dropdown

3.0.5

  • Fix : minor tracking fix

3.0.4

  • Fix : minor bug fixes

3.0.3

  • New : add monetization button

3.0.2

  • Fix : metrics triggers

3.0.1

  • Fix : fix tracking parameters

3.0.0

  • New : new feeds by hashtags and upload/search videos

2.0.7

  • Fix : minor bug with feed syncing

2.0.6

  • Update : readme and screenshots

2.0.5

  • Fix : fixed deploy issues with assets

2.0.3

  • New : onboarding wizard
  • New : full video feed sync with Firework
  • New : manage your video feed like any other post in the admin
  • New : global embeds for feeds

1.0

  • First version with widget support
sections.description:
Create engaging shoppable video and livestream commerce on your site in minutes.

Create engaging shoppable video and livestream commerce on your site in minutes.

Firework is the world’s leading video commerce solution built for brands and retailers. Leveraging shoppable video, livestreaming commerce and powerful monetization capabilities, Firework empowers the world’s most dynamic and exciting retailers and consumer brands to build engaging video experiences on their owned and operated digital properties and across channels at a global scale.

1. Livestream shoppable video
2. Short-form shoppable video
3. Content creation studio
4. Ads and retail media
5. First-party data

For more information on our products visit https://firework.com. For more information on Creation Cloud – see here

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach us at ithelpdesk@fireworkhq.com

Pricing

Free to Install! Connect with your existing Firework plan. Upgrade for premium features. To see more on what’s included and pricing visit https://firework.com/pricing/.
